QuestData.Title: Feathersong's Redemption
QuestData.Description: I must confess I was not entirely honest with you, $n. I meant to drink the potion and join my wife.$b$bAnd even she was taken from her rest... I cannot fail her again. I must live and do what I can to stop this coming storm to be worthy of joining her.$b$bCome, young one. Let us take care of the harpy matriarch and restore Tel'anor to its former glory. We cannot let this poison go to waste, eh?
QuestData.CompletionText: It will take time, but Tel'anor will flourish again. I swear it on my life.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. You have given me clarity of purpose and a reason to live again. Together we will save Suramar and atone for the sins of my people.
